src.GameObjects

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.GameObjects.Entity
      • src.GameObjects.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, NPC, PlayerCharacter

    public abstract class Character
extends Entity
    This stores the stats of each character entity and handles the movement of all characters and determines if they need to be removed from the game. All characters are entities so Character is a child class of Entity

      • Character

        public Character(double x,
                 double y,
                 double size,
                 java.util.ArrayList<org.newdawn.slick.Image> spriteList,
                 Character.FACTION characterFaction,
                 int projTypeID)
        Instantiate a new Character that is also an Entity
        Parameters:
        x - The world x-coordinate of the character
        y - The world y-coordinate of the character
        size - The world size of the character
        spriteList - The sprites that the character uses
        characterFaction - Which faction the character belongs to
        projTypeID - What type of projectile the entity fires
